objects.name: Analytic 0851
objects.description: User or remote input triggers application crash or segmentation fault (e.g., SIGSEGV) with service recovery attempts, observed via audit logs and systemd journaling.

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: auditd:SYSCALL
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Process segfault or abnormal termination after invoking vulnerable syscall sequence

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: journald:Application
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Segfault or crash log entry associated with specific application binary

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: NSM:Flow
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Unusual request pattern leading up to service crash (e.g., malformed or oversized payload)

x_mitre_mutable_elements.description: Specific binary fault signature or stack trace identifiers unique to the application context
Suspect source IPs for correlation across requests and service failure timing
